Hello! Ubuntu newbie here: Put Ubuntu on a 7 year old Dell laptop that had bit the dust, 48 hours ago.  Fell in LOVE instantly... now I got it on my netbook too :)
haha! Awesome! I'm seriously considering putting Ubuntu on my Macbook Pro and Mac Mini because I'm sick of not being able to rip DVDs or use Python.
